name: Hooded Fighter
description:
Are you looking for a 2d platformer easy to play but hard to finish that you will enjoy playing for hours ?

Then you should start playing Hooded Fighter, a 2d platformer game that will test your accuracy and patience.

The game features 18 intricate levels divided into 2 chapters (for now) with 2 boss fights. 
Some hard levels will require patience. With your ability to double jump, crush the enemies (at least some of them) 
or just use your ammo to kill them and get to the end.

In order to progress through chapters you have to collect the scattered golden leaves.
